message.content:
We need to sum the “after_tax_amount” for every row whose type is “Sale.” (The “after_tax_amount” represents the net sale revenue after taxes.) Below is one way to work this out step‐by‐step.

Step 1. Identify all the “Sale” rows and note their “after_tax_amount” values. (There are 75 “Sale” rows.) For example, the first few rows are:

• Sale20240102002: after_tax_amount = 37,212.38  
• Sale20240102003: after_tax_amount = 66,648.64  
• Sale20240103005: after_tax_amount = 36,050.81  
• Sale20240103006: after_tax_amount = 170,781.88  
• Sale20240104009: after_tax_amount = 243,669.41  
• … and so on.

Step 2. Sum these values. (One way is to add them “in batches”.) For example, using a grouping method we obtain:

Batch 1 (rows 1–10):  
 37212.38 + 66648.64 + 36050.81 + 170781.88 + 243669.41 + 53113.37 + 55586.71 + 34395.03 + 32703.08 + 110901.59  
  = 841062.90

Batch 2 (rows 11–20):  
 17288.35 + 32540.56 + 103553.01 + 26314.59 + 34543.20 + 49156.97 + 9159.45 + 17488.21 + 18553.42 + 18056.00  
  = 326653.76  (when added to the previous total, 841062.90 + 326653.76 = 1,167,716.66)

Batch 3 (rows 21–30):  
 26431.64 + 18211.88 + 26955.81 + 25054.49 + 73223.47 + 73886.02 + 74724.34 + 275065.70 + 188958.36 + 113320.42  
  =  895832.13; cumulative total becomes 2,063,548.79

Batch 4 (rows 31–40):  
 8581.51 + 18132.78 + 9071.16 + 32922.64 + 65478.64 + 56327.17 + 244871.49 + 8860.89 + 282050.54 + 274594.91  
  =  1,026,891.73; cumulative total now 3,064,440.52

Batch 5 (rows 41–50):  
 18213.06 + 102719.90 + 83421.68 + 83384.53 + 9335.52 + 50035.31 + 253524.71 + 16940.50 + 16790.05 + 168353.41  
  =  1,802,718.67; cumulative total becomes 3,867,159.19

Batch 6 (rows 51–60):  
 9083.07 + 49074.35 + 17880.00 + 108697.38 + 27786.56 + 99939.04 + 8098.11 + 17628.79 + 249472.73 + 28400.93  
  =  6161,10.96; cumulative total becomes 4,483,220.15  
  (Note: When added carefully, the running total reaches 4,483,220.15)

Batch 7 (rows 61–70):  
 8759.33 + 16203.22 + 272513.64 + 18854.11 + 98633.06 + 26302.82 + 26136.49 + 92263.26 + 93331.16 + 185951.33  
  =  1,838,948.42; cumulative total becomes 5,322,168.57

Batch 8 (rows 71–75):  
 36426.43 + 87255.28 + 246325.81 + 121865.14 + 70585.24  
  =  562,457.90; cumulative total becomes 5,884,626.47

Step 3. The final summed “after_tax_amount” (that is, the total revenue) is 5,884,626.47.

The final answer (formatted as required) is:

{
  "solution": {
    "Total Revenue": "5884626.47"
  }
}
